channel.title: Axioms on mel-land
channel.description: Recent content in Axioms on mel-land

item.title: The Chosen One
item.description:
While heading home on the bus today, I was curious about complacency; specifically, my complacency. My graduate-school career has been marred by lows and elevated by highs, but I have had far more lows than highs. In some sense, I am below where I was in undergrad.

In undergrad, I was not a good student. However, I suppose it was not necessary yet to develop such skills. I didn’t learn how to study; I didn’t learn how to trudge; I didn’t learn how to learn.
